# addAlarm(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an alarm to the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func addAlarm(_ alarm: EKAlarm)
```

## Parameters

- **alarm**: The alarm to be added.

## Adding and Removing Alarms

- **hasAlarms**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has alarms.
- **removeAlarm(_:)**: Removes an alarm from the calendar item.
- **alarms**: The alarms associated with the calendar item, as an array of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm] objects.
